Content:
{
  "schemaVersion": "2.0",
  "description": "Run Docker actions on containers.",
  "parameters": {
    "action": {
      "type": "String",
      "description": "The type of action to perform.",
      "allowedValues": [
        "Create",
        "Start",
        "Run",
        "Stop",
        "Rm",
        "Exec",
        "Inspect",
        "Logs",
        "Ps",
        "Stats",
        "Pull",
        "Images",
        "Rmi"
      ]
    },
    "container": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The Docker container Id.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-\\/]*$",
      "maxChars":128
    },
    "image": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The Docker image name.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-\\/]*$",
      "maxChars":128
    },
    "cmd": {
      "type": "String",
      "default":"",
      "description": "(Optional) The container command.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[^;,&|]*$",
      "maxChars":128
    },
    "memory": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The container memory limit.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[0-9]*[bkmg]?$",
      "maxChars":10
    },
    "cpuShares": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The container CPU shares (relative weight).",
      "allowedPattern":"^/?[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*$",
      "maxChars":10
    },
    "volume": {
      "type": "StringList",
      "default":[
      ],
      "description": "(Optional) The container volume mounts.",
      "displayType":"textarea",
      "allowedPattern":"^[\\w\\\\\\\/_\\:\\-\\.\\\"\\(\\)\\^ ]*$",
      "maxChars":128
    },
    "env": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The container environment variables.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[^;,&|]*$",
      "maxChars":256
    },
    "user": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The container username.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*$",
      "maxChars":128
    },
    "publish": {
      "type": "String",
      "default": "",
      "description": "(Optional) The container published ports.",
      "allowedPattern":"^[0-9a-zA-Z:\\-\\/.]*$",
      "maxChars":50
    }
  },
  "mainSteps": [
    {
      "action": "aws:runDockerAction",
      "name": "RunDockerAction",
      "inputs": {
        "action": "{{ action }}",
        "container": "{{ container }}",
        "image": "{{ image }}",
        "memory": "{{ memory }}",
        "cpuShares": "{{ cpuShares }}",
        "volume": "{{ volume }}",
        "cmd": "{{ cmd }}",
        "env": "{{ env }}",
        "user": "{{ user }}",
        "publish": "{{ publish }}"
      }
    }
  ]
}
Name: AWS-RunDockerAction
